file_content.text: Dark Lord. I realize how informal this must seem, but time is short.
Lord Wrath. It's time. You must confront him.
I hope you're ready for the hunt of your life.
Commander. I have need of you.
No, I don't care. Revoke their access. All of them! Now!
Lana, what's going on? Where are you?
Our former Emperor. Vitiate. He's--
I don't care what they tell you. Assume they're lying and deal with them!
He's here--Vitiate's presence, here on Ziost. He's taking over this outpost, controlling soldiers and Sith, using them to murder anyone he can.
Hold them off. I'm on my way.
I'll be there soon.
You'd better not be falling apart. You have work to do.
Pull yourself together.
Back up. Start from the beginning.
Tell me more.
Good. Thank you.
We have work to do.
There's no time for that now.
I'm sending coordinates. We'll hold this bunker as long as we can, but you must hurry or--
This sounds like one of those Imperial problems, not like a "me" problem.
He's not my problem.
If we don't stop him, everyone dies. Everyone.
There is that....
The former Emperor. Vitiate. He's--
Lana, can you read me? Lana...?
Ziost.
With all respect, my lord, we don't have the time.
No, I don't care. Revoke their access. All of them! Now!
Lana, what's going on? Where are you?
Our former Emperor. Vitiate. He's--
I don't care what they tell you. Assume they're lying and deal with them!
He's here--Vitiate's presence, here on Ziost. He's taking over this outpost, controlling soldiers and Sith, using them to murder anyone he can.
Hold them off. I'm on my way.
I'll be there soon.
Good. Thank you.
Back up. Start from the beginning.
Tell me more.
With all respect, my lord, we don't have the time.
You'd better not be falling apart. You have work to do.
Pull yourself together.
We have work to do.
I'm sending coordinates. We'll hold this bunker as long as we can, but you must hurry or--
Lana, can you read me? Lana...?
Ziost.
No, I don't care. Revoke their access. All of them! Now!

He's here--Vitiate's presence, here on Ziost. He's taking over this outpost, controlling soldiers and Sith, using them to murder anyone he can.

I'll be there soon.
Good. Thank you.

Tell me more.
